tool_description: Consolidates revenue data from multiple distribution platforms and sources into a unified format for processing.

data_sources.description: List of revenue data source identifiers

content_id.description: Unique identifier for the content being tracked

reporting_period_start.description: Start date for revenue reporting period

reporting_period_end.description: End date for revenue reporting period

include_estimates.description: Whether to include estimated revenue figures

error_messages: Invalid date range: End date must be after start date and both must be valid ISO dates.
Data source unavailable: One or more specified data sources cannot be accessed.
Content ID not found: The specified content identifier does not exist in the system.
No revenue data: No revenue records found for the specified period and content.
usage: Specify the data sources, content ID, and reporting period. The tool will aggregate all revenue data from the sources for the specified content and time period.

source_names.description: Names of revenue sources corresponding to amounts

currencies.description: Currency codes for each revenue amount

record_count.description: Total number of revenue records processed
